Functions
Search
bool Regex::Search(
const string& 
in 
szString,
MatchResults@ 
pResults,
const 
Regex@ 
pRegex,
MatchFlagType 
flags
= 
match_default
)

Returns whether some sub-sequence in the target sequence (the subject) matches the regular expression pRegex.

pResults will contain the results of the operation, if any.
